name: In Memory (itch) (SoBad)
description:
What have you done, Ray?

The answers to what's happened to you are hidden on the computer. Discover passcodes, unlock folders, and query the AI for answers. That is, if it can be trusted...

An escape-room-style puzzle game except you never have to worry you forgot to check behind the couch! Everything is in front of you.


Tested With:

Windows, Mac, Linux


Controls:

Keyboard to type and send commands 
(for example, type "shutdown" to quit)

Mouse to interact with locks and files


A special thanks to my many beta testers!

Made throughout February 2023 for the Monthly Game Project. Patreon supporters received a download key, Discord access, and lots of behind-the-scenes content!
